label: Global Colors Settings
name: global_colors
help_text: If global color is not apply somewhere then need to go to respective module and need to change

children.label: Primary Color
children.name: primary
children.inline_help_text: This color settings helps to change the color on Buttons, Icons and Heading (H5 Tag)

children.label: Secondary Color
children.name: tertiary_secondary
children.inline_help_text: This color settings helps to change the color on Heading Text (H1, H2, H3, H4)
children.help_text: Always click on Apply Changes after changing color

children.label: Tertiary Color
children.name: secondary
children.inline_help_text: This color settings helps to change the color on Paragraph Text and Body Text

children.label: Universal Color
children.name: universal_color
children.inline_help_text: This color settings helps to change the color on Buttons Text, Buttons Hover Color And as a white color Replacement

children.name: primary
children.inline_help_text: This will apply to paragraph text and body

children.label: Font

children.label: General Style

children.inline_help_text: This General Style won't applies to footer form, for changes in footer form please visit to Website Footer
